text: A4: CDC, WHO, & ACOG rec that #COVID19 #vaccine be offered to ppl who are pregnant/breastfeeding: https://t.co/RWtD6GGC0m. Pregnant ppl were not incl in #clinicaltrials, but >15K have since received a vax & enrolled in CDC’s V-safe program (https://t.co/qXlvyzNe3e). #AskReuters https://t.co/KjIFdMhuDM
